onyomiExamples.meaning: look, appearance, spectacle, sight, observation meditation, outlook on ..., view of ...

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to see, to look, to watch, to view, to observe, to examine, to look over, to assess, to check, to judge, to look after, to attend to, to take care of, to keep an eye on, to experience, to meet with (misfortune, success, etc.), to try ..., to have a go at ..., to give ... a try, to see (that) ..., to find (that) ...
